WRITING.TEXT: I had weird surrealistic dream once about a hospital but the doctors jobs were to bring Doritos to the patients. So they would run around the corridors with bags of doritos. It also had a voiceover like an ad and very bright colours.
Never go to the bathroom again.
Why was 5 afraid of 6? Because 6 was convicted of the raping and murder of 124 children.
I think his throat cancer spreads with the music.
A knife I only need the gun to shoot up my school.
I get super overstimulated by touch and was always paranoid of tickles to the point where I would burst in tears if someone wiggled their fingers next to me.

Use to punch myself as punishment. Then I scratched scabs. Then I scratched my skin without scabs until it bled. And then one day I took a kitchen knife and went over and over my skin until it hurt enough. (The blade was hella dull)
